# zitadel_zitadel (Data Source)

Datasource representing the session token of the provider's configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "zitadel" "default" {
  //
}

output "token" {
  value     = data.zitadel.default.token
  sensitive = true
}
```

## Schema

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `token` (String, Sensitive) The session token.
